hubris:Hubris.NAME: Hubris
hubris:Hubris.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Autoplay. NL Gain 2 Strength and lose 1 Dexterity. NL Inescapable.

hubris:Mulligan.NAME: Mulligan
hubris:Mulligan.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Discard your hand, NL then draw that many cards. NL Purge.

hubris:PotOfGreed.NAME: Pot of Greed
hubris:PotOfGreed.DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 cards. NL Permanently add a Greed to your deck.

hubris:Greed.NAME: Greed
hubris:Greed.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Gain an additional !M! gold at the end of combat for each Greed in your deck. NL Inescapable.

hubris:Wrath.NAME: Wrath
hubris:Wrath.DESCRIPTION: Autoplay. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Place a copy of this copy into your discard pile. Inescapable.
